definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The only game I’ve gotten 100 percent completion on is the odd Sudoku.
sentences.chinese: 唯一一个我100%打穿的游戏就是数独了。

sentences.english: They were then left alone with another person they understood was also taking part in a puzzle-solving experiment.
sentences.chinese: 然后被单独留下，和另以为试验的人一起做数独。

sentences.english: The number but section is all the rage the world the number anagram topic game.
sentences.chinese: 数独是一款风靡世界的数字谜题游戏。

sentences.english: Sudoku disk is Jiu Gong, every house is divided into nine small cells.
sentences.chinese: 数独盘面是个九宫，每一宫又分为九个小格。

sentences.english: Sudoku, place unique symbols in a square.
sentences.chinese: 数独，在方格中放置单独符号。

sentences.english: Telling the time is a simple as doing a killer sudoku in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 它的指示方式简单的就像在黑暗中玩杀手数独游戏。

sentences.english: Believe it or not, APT can even be used to solve Sodoku puzzles!
sentences.chinese: 信不信由你，APT甚至能用来解决数独难题。

sentences.english: Sudoku appeared in British newspaper in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，英国的报纸刊登了数独游戏。

sentences.english: A lot of people do Sudoku. In fact some doctors prescribe it.
sentences.chinese: 很多人做数独，事实上，有些医生将它开作处方。

sentences.english: Sudoku is such an additive past time, so is this app.
sentences.chinese: 数独是一个令人上瘾的消遣游戏。

definition: land battle chess, Chinese board game similar to Stratego
four rules of arithmetic/addition, subtraction, multiplication and division
International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]
